DOC.brief_summary: The objective study find pharmacokinetic/dynamic ( PK/PD ) characteristic desmopressin melt nocturia patient ( compare healthy volunteer child ) . The main question investigator want answer : - Are difference related pathophysiological factor involve nocturia ? - Are age/gender/size difference ? - Can investigator identify patient likely develop hyponatraemia ? - Can investigator individualize treatment reduce risk hyponatraemia ?
